alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 2:11PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Elko County through 245 PM PDT... At 211 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles northwest of Currie, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Elko County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
